post.text: A conversation with Hillary's best friend Betsy about breakups, prom dates, and skateboards:

comment.author: Courtney
comment.text: all we have to do is vote for the right person, in the person of hillary, cause she's the right one, she's real and she will definitely lead us into a better future

replies.author: Alyssa
replies.text: The only people who will have a better future are her and bill!!! They will make another 200 million they are pure corruption!!! It's time the American people have had enough of her corruption !!!
